name: Kerbal Space Program Save Metadata File
summary: A LOADMETA file is a metadata file that accompanies a saved game ( .SFS ) file for Squad Kerbal Space Program, a video game where players build and launch rockets. It stores cached information, including a hash , for an SFS file the game references to quickly load saved game information. Users can find LOADMETA files alongside SFS files with the same name (e.g., example.sfs and example.loadmeta ).

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
